summary: The Coast Guard tracks and supports its activities with its Marine Information for Safety and Law Enforcement data system. It contains information on over 700,000 vessels and more. Earlier efforts to upgrade the system did not deliver all planned improvements, such as an ability to reduce duplicate records. Problems persist. For example, users told us duplicate entries created uncertainty on whether vessels or their operators...
title: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Ensure Investments in Key Data System Meet Mission and User Needs
